name: 系统元数据查询模板字典
description: Sequelize元数据、基础数据表等系统元数据相关表的查询模板

Sequelize元数据总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM sequelize_meta

元数据记录列表.sql: SELECT name FROM sequelize_meta ORDER BY name

最新元数据记录.sql: SELECT name FROM sequelize_meta ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 1
最新元数据记录.description: 查询最新的Sequelize元数据记录
最新元数据记录.response: 最新元数据记录查询完成

元数据记录检查.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'EXISTS' ELSE 'NOT_EXISTS' END as status FROM sequelize_meta WHERE name = 'specific_migration'
元数据记录检查.description: 检查特定元数据记录是否存在

基础数据总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM base

系统数据统计.sql: SELECT is_system, COUNT(*) as count FROM base GROUP BY is_system ORDER BY is_system DESC
系统数据统计.description: 统计系统数据和非系统数据分布

创建者统计.sql: SELECT creator_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM base WHERE creator_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY creator_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
创建者统计.description: 统计基础数据创建者分布

更新者统计.sql: SELECT updater_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM base WHERE updater_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY updater_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
更新者统计.description: 统计基础数据更新者分布

软删除数据统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN deleted_at IS NULL THEN 1 END) as active_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as deleted_count FROM base
软删除数据统计.description: 统计活跃和已删除的基础数据

本月新增基础数据.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM base WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月新增基础数据.description: 查询本月新增基础数据数量

系统元数据概览.sql: SELECT 'sequelize_meta' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM sequelize_meta UNION ALL SELECT 'base' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM base
系统元数据概览.response: 系统元数据概览查询完成
